thread.title: Piedmont women play out scoreless draw with Maryville
thread.title_full: Piedmont women play out scoreless draw with Maryville

author: AccessWDUN Staff
title: Piedmont women play out scoreless draw with Maryville
text:
Thursday October 15th, 2015 12:41PM Posted 11:06PM on Wednesday 14th October 2015 ( 13 hours ago ) Piedmont women play out scoreless draw with Maryville By AccessWDUN Staff Related Articles Piedmont women's soccer claims 12th straight win Piedmont women's soccer shuts out William Peace 2-0 to stay undefeated Four Lady Lions earn USA South weekly awards Piedmont women's soccer edges out top 25 battle with Berry 
DEMOREST — Completing a tough three game swing in conference play, the Piedmont College women's soccer team was forced to settle for a scoreless draw on Wednesday evening against visiting USA South foe Maryville College. 
Cassidy Reich led Piedmont with four shots finding the target multiple times, but Maryville keeper Rachel Taylor was able to make the saves when needed to keep the contest scoreless. Taylor combined with Piedmont keeper Michaela Gardner to force the second scoreless draw between these two programs in the last four meetings. 
Maryville created a large advantage with nine corners to three for Piedmont, but Gardner was up to the task several times making key saves throughout as did the Piedmont defense which posted its 12th clean sheet in 15 games now on the season. Associated Tags : Piedmont women's soccer © Copyright 2015 AccessWDUN.com
